item.title: php mailsender
item.description: A quick way to test mail sending via php: <?php ini_set( 'display_errors', 1 ); error_reporting( E_ALL ); $from = "webmaster@example.com"; $to = "me@example.com"; $subject = "PHP Mail Test script"; $message = "This is a test to check the PHP Mail functionality"; $headers = "From:" . $from; mail($to,$subject,$message, $headers); echo "Test email sent"; ?>
